sources.title: Sorry, Wrong Number (1948) Director: Michael Curtiz, Featuring Barbara Stanwyck, Burt Lancaster, Wendell Corey, Ed Begley, William Conrad
sources.description: Sorry, Wrong Number is a 1948 American thriller FILM NOlR  directed by Anatole Litvak and starring Barbara Stanwyck,  Burt Lancaster, Wendell Corey, Ed Begley and William Conrad. It tells the story of a woman who overhears a murder plot. The film was adapted by Lucille Fletcher from her 1943 radio play. Stanwyck was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actress.   You can find out more about the movie from this Wikipedia page .

metadata.Plot: Leona Stevenson is sick and confined to her bed. One night while waiting for her husband to return home, she picks up the phone and accidentally overhears a conversation between two men planning a murder. She becomes increasingly desperate as she tries to work out who the victim is so the crime can be prevented.
metadata.Actors: Barbara Stanwyck, Burt Lancaster, Ann Richards
